anniversary.title: The Roman legions on the Rhine refuse to declare their allegiance to Galba, instead proclaiming thei...
anniversary.description: The Roman legions on the Rhine refuse to declare their allegiance to Galba, instead proclaiming their legate, Aulus Vitellius, as emperor.[1]

app.app_title: The Rhine Rebellion: When Legions Chose Their Emperor
app.description: Interactive experience exploring the pivotal moment when Roman legions chose Vitellius over Galba in 69 CE
